infoText.HeadingA: Providing real-time license validation of cannibis retailers.
infoText.PspanB: • Provide the cannabis community a symbol of trust
infoText.PspanC: • Expand to every legalized cannabis state

Services.ParaA: We provide real-time status of your cannabis retail license. Activate your retailer account by searching for your retailer license number and viewing your retailer information.
Services.ParaB: Receive unlimited access to our Customer Pre-Verification tools to view information of a customer whenever they place an order online or by text message.
Services.ParaC: We provide a way for your customers to securely upload and store their state photo ID in our vault by using our powerful image tokenization process.
Services.ParaD: Receive (12) custom QR code window / windshield clings that can be scanned to provide customers the real-time status of your cannabis retail license.
